other_tests.findings: Negative for hepatitis A, B, C and Epstein-Barr.
Negative for antimitochondrial antibodies, anti-smooth muscle antibodies, and antinuclear antibodies.
Normal aspartate and alanine aminotransferase levels (19 U/liter).
other_tests.changes_over_time: Elevated levels of aspartate aminotransferase (960 U/liter) and alanine aminotransferase (347 U/liter) on admission; aspartate aminotransferase levels returned to normal range within 5 days of discontinuing lamotrigine, while alanine aminotransferase levels remained mildly elevated at 102 U/liter.
